column2:
"Excellent. I see you're one of the good ones.
My fears were completely unfounded, then."

"Word is that many of the prizes you get from
playing FUN Scratch Tickets are valuable
items you normally wouldn't be able to find."
"Make sure you keep on using them, all right?"

"Heh. That reminds me of this one time, in the old
days..."

"うむ、よろしい！
やはり君は優秀なアークスだな。
杞憂で済んでよかった。"

"ＦＵＮスクラッチの景品は
普通には手に入れにくい
貴重品が多いと聞いている。"
"今後も有効活用していくといいぞ！"
